Step1.text1:
Tracking your blood sugar helps you see how you are doing with your diabetes care plan. Looking at the numbers with your health care team can help you notice patterns in how medicines, food, and physical activity affect your blood sugar.

This tracker is for your own personal use and is not monitored. Consult your health care provider for any questions you may have regarding your own medical condition, including the management of your diabetes.
Step1.title: Blood Sugar Tracker
Step1.errorMessage: Please select how often you take it

Step2.text1: The Diabetes Health Coach recommends setting up a reminder to take and track your VictozaÂ® doses. Check the boxes next to the time(s) indicated to set up a reminder by text and/or email.
Step2.title: Add Reminder
Step2.subTitle: Set reminder for Blood Sugar Tracker
Step2.errorMessage: Please select at least one item.

items.label: By checking this box, I AGREE to receive automatically sent text message reminders from Novo Nordisk Inc. as part of its Diabetes Health Coach program at the mobile number below.

I understand that I am not required to provide my consent as a condition of participation in the Diabetes Health Coach program.


You will receive text messages as frequently as you choose.

Message and data rates may apply.

For more information about our Terms of Use go to Terms of Use.

To view Novo Nordisk's Privacy Policy go to Privacy Policy.

To unsubscribe, go to My Preferences to manage your reminders.

For help, visit Contact Us.


Please print for your records.

Step4.text11: Your Reminder text will be sent to:
Step4.title: Add Reminder
Step4.text12: . To change your mobile phone number for text messages or reminders, please go to My preferences

Step5.text1: Your Reminder e-mail will be sent to: [email@email.com]. Remember to add customercarecenter@cornerstones4care.com to your contacts list so your reminders do not end up in your spam folder. To change your reminders, go to About Me.
Step5.title: Add Reminder
